mapper.select:
SELECT T1.STR_HOP_DT /* 입고희망일 */ , T1.STR_OJ_WARE_NO /* 입고대상창고번호 */ , T3.LGST_OSTR_AK_NO /* 물류출고요청번호 */ , T1.OSTR_AK_NO /* 출고요청번호 */ , T1.OSTR_AK_RGST_DT /* 출고요청등록일자 */ , T1.OSTR_AK_TP_CD /* 출고요청유형코드 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'OSTR_AK_TP_CD', T1.OSTR_AK_TP_CD) AS OSTR_AK_TP_NM /* 출고요청유형명 */ , MAX(T1.RECT_OSTR_DT) AS RECT_OSTR_DT /* 최근출고일자 */ , T2.WARE_NM /* 창고명 */ , T1.OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO /* 출고대상창고번호 */ FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ T1 /* 품목출고요청내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON T1.OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO = T2.WARE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_IFIN_ITM_OSTR_AK_SEND_ETXT T3 /* 품목출고요청송신전문 */ ON T3.OSTR_AK_NO = T1.OSTR_AK_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.STR_OJ_WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} /*입고대상창고번호*/
AND T1.OSTR_AK_TP_CD IN ('310','320','330')
AND T1.OSTR_AK_TP_CD = #{ostrAkTpCd}
AND T1.STR_HOP_DT BETWEEN #{startStrHopDt} AND #{endStrHopDt} AND T2.APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{startStrHopDt},1,6) AND T2.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} AND T2.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY T1.OSTR_AK_TP_CD , T1.STR_OJ_WARE_NO , T1.OSTR_AK_RGST_DT , T1.OSTR_AK_NO , T1.STR_HOP_DT , T1.OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO , T2.WARE_NM , T3.LGST_OSTR_AK_NO ORDER BY T1.OSTR_AK_RGST_DT DESC, T1.OSTR_AK_TP_CD, T1.STR_OJ_WARE_NO, T1.OSTR_AK_NO ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(B.SVPD_SAP_CD)) AS SAP_CD /* SAP코드 */ , A.ITM_PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , B.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS ITM_PD_NM1 /* 품목상품명 */ , A.OSTR_AK_NO AS OSTR_AK_NO /* 출고요청번호 */ , A.OSTR_AK_SN AS OSTR_AK_SN /* 출고요청순번 */ , A.OSTR_AK_TP_CD AS OSTR_AK_TP_CD /* 출고요청유형코드 */ , A.STR_HOP_DT AS STR_HOP_DT /* 입고희망일자 */ , A.MNGT_UNIT_CD AS MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드 */ , A.BOX_UNIT_QTY AS BOX_UNIT_QTY /* 박스단위수량 */ , A.ITM_GD_CD AS ITM_GD_CD /* 품목등급코드 */ , A.OSTR_AK_QTY AS OSTR_AK_QTY /* 출고요청수량 */ , A.OSTR_CNFM_QTY AS OSTR_CNFM_QTY /* 출고확정수량 */ , A.RMK_CN AS RMK_CN /* 비고 */ , A.RECT_OSTR_DT AS RECT_OSTR_DT /* 최근출고일자 */ , A.OSTR_WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AS OSTR_WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 출고창고관리파트너번호 */ , A.OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO AS OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO /* 출고대상창고번호 */ , A.STR_OJ_WARE_NO AS STR_OJ_WARE_NO /* 입고대상창고번호 */
, '0' AS CFRM_CNT /* 방묵확정수량 */ , B.SVPD_ITEM_KND AS ITM_KND /* 품목구분 */ , B.SVPD_ITEM_KND_NM AS ITM_KND_NM /* 품목구분명 */ , B.SVPD_IMG_URL AS IMG_URL /* IMGURL */ , A.OSTR_AK_WARE_DV_CD AS OSTR_AK_WARE_DV_CD /* 출고요청창고구분코드 */ , A.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AS WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ , NVL(T1.WAREHOUSE_QTY,0) AS WAREHOUSE_QTY /* 물류수량*/ , NVL(T1.CENTER_QTY,0) AS CENTER_QTY /* 센터수량 */ , NVL(T2.INDI_QTY,0) AS INDI_QTY /* 개인수량 */ , NVL(T3.USE_QTY , 0) AS USE_QTY /* 사용수량 */ , NVL(T4.BASE_STOC_QTY,0) AS BASE_STOC_QTY /* 기본재고수량 */ , NVL(T4.SFT_STOC_QTY,0) AS SFT_STOC_QTY /* 안전재고수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ A /* 품목출고요청내역 */ INNER JOIN () B ON B.SVPD_PD_CD = A.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */
, '0' AS WAREHOUSE_QTY /* 물류수량 */
, SUM(DECODE(WARE_NO, #{ostrOjWareNo}, PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY)) AS WAREHOUSE_QTY /* 출고대상창고시점재고수량 */
, SUM(DECODE(WARE_NO, #{strOjWareNo}, PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY)) AS CENTER_QTY /* 센터수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND WARE_NO IN (#{ostrOjWareNo}, #{strOjWareNo}) GROUP BY ITM_PD_CD ) T1 ON T1.ITM_PD_CD = B.SVPD_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A1.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , SUM(A1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY) AS INDI_QTY /* 개인수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ A1 /* 고객서비스품목재고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ B1 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON A1.WARE_NO = B1.WARE_NO WHERE 1=1 AND B1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND B1.HGR_WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} AND B1.WARE_DV_CD = '2' AND B1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD NOT IN ('20,30') GROUP BY A1.ITM_PD_CD ) T2 ON B.SVPD_PD_CD = T2.ITM_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(A2 IX_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ_01) */ A2.ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , SUM(A2.USE_QTY) AS USE_QTY /* 사용수량 */ FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ A2 /* 서비스작업출고내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ B2 /* 월별창고내역 */ ON A2.WK_WARE_NO = B2.WARE_NO WHERE A2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND B2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A2.FNL_VST_FSH_DT LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '%' AND B2.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND B2.WARE_DV_CD = '2' AND B2.HGR_WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} GROUP BY A2.ITM_PD_CD ) T3 ON T3.ITM_PD_CD = B.SVPD_PD_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCITM_BASE_SFT_STOC_IZ T4 /* 월별품목기준안전재고내역 */ ON B.SVPD_PD_CD = T4.PD_CD AND T4.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') AND T4.WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} WHERE 1=1 AND A.OSTR_AK_NO = #{ostrAkNo} AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.OSTR_AK_SN

SELECT WARE_NO AS CODE_ID /* 창고번호 */ , WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME /* 창고명 */ , WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ , WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{apyYm},1,6) AND WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd} AND WARE_ICHR_NO = #{wareIchrNo} AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY WARE_NM
ORDER BY SORT_DV_VAL
SELECT #{ostrAkTpCd} || #{ostrAkRgstDt} || LPAD(SQ_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ$OSTR_AK_NO.NEXTVAL,7,'0') AS OSTR_AK_NO /* 출고요청번호 */ FROM DUAL
SELECT #{ostrAkTpCd} || #{ostrAkRgstDt} || LPAD(SQ_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ$OSTR_AK_NO.NEXTVAL,7,'0') AS OSTR_AK_NO /* 출고요청번호 */ FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ ( /* 품목출고요청내역 */ OSTR_AK_NO /* 출고요청번호 */ , OSTR_AK_SN /* 출고요청일련번호 */ , OSTR_AK_TP_CD /* 출고요청유형코드 */ , STR_OJ_WARE_NO /* 입고대상창고번호 */ , OSTR_OJ_WARE_NO /* 출고대상창고번호 */ , OSTR_AK_RGST_DT /* 출고요청등록일자 */ , STR_HOP_DT /* 입고희망일자 */ , OSTR_AK_WARE_DV_CD /* 출고요청창고구분코드 */ , WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 창고관리파트너번호 */ , WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /* 창고관리파트너조직유형코드 */ , OSTR_OJ_WARE_DV_CD /* 출고대상창고구분코드 */ , OSTR_WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO /* 출고창고관리파트너번호 */ , OSTR_WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD /* 출고창고관리파트너조직유형코드 */ , ITM_PD_CD /* 품목상품코드 */ , MNGT_UNIT_CD /* 관리단위코드 */ , BOX_UNIT_QTY /* 박스단위수량 */ , ITM_GD_CD /* 품목등급코드 */ , OSTR_AK_QTY /* 출고요청수량 */ , OSTR_CNFM_QTY /* 출고확정수량 */ , RECT_OSTR_DT /* 최근출고일자 */ , OSTR_AGG_QTY /* 출고누계수량 */ , OVIV_TP_CD /* 배차유형코드 */ , OSTR_CNFM_CD /* 출고확정코드 */ , RMK_CN /* 비고내용 */ , DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ ) VALUES ( #{ostrAkNo} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(OSTR_AK_SN), 0) +1 FROM TB_SVST_ITM_OSTR_AK_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND OSTR_AK_NO = #{ostrAkNo}) , #{ostrAkTpCd} , #{strOjWareNo} , #{ostrOjWareNo} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , #{strHopDt} , (SELECT WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) , (SELECT WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) , (SELECT OG_TP_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) , (SELECT WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{ostrOjWareNo} AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) , (SELECT WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{ostrOjWareNo} AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) , (SELECT OG_TP_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND WARE_NO = #{ostrOjWareNo} AND APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')) , #{itmPdCd} , #{mngtUnitCd} , #{boxUnitQty} , #{itmGdCd} , #{ostrAkQty} , #{ostrCnfmQty} , #{rectOstrDt} , #{ostrAggQty} , #{ovivTpCd} , #{ostrCnfmCd} , #{rmkCn} , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT T1.WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.WARE_NO = #{ostrOjWareNo} AND T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')
SELECT T1.WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.WARE_NO = #{ostrOjWareNo} AND T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')
SELECT T1.WARE_DV_CD /* 창고구분코드 */ FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.WARE_NO = #{strOjWareNo} AND T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')
